pr_title: JBPM-9165 - Stunner - Global / Process variables allow empty value as data type

timeline.message:
JBPM-9165 - Stunner - Global / Process variables allow empty value as data type.

This removes the empty value from the data type combo box and uses the value "Object" as the default value.

timeline.bodyText: really minor improvement I see here, maybe instead of using the literal you can use Object.class.getSimpleName(), so we can rely on typed code this way...
timeline.author: romartin

timeline.bodyText: same here, I would prefer avoid use of literals
timeline.author: romartin
